desmoj.extensions.experimentation.util

Class Run

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.experimentation.util.Run

  • public class Run
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a parametrized simulation run. The parameters can be read from an XML file. The XML file must start with a tag. This tag contains model and experiment parameter specifications (tags and ). Each parameter specification is stated in the form .

    • Constructor Detail

      • Run

        public Run(Model defaultModel,
           ExperimentRunner defaultExpRunner,
           java.util.Map defaultExpSettings,
           java.util.Map defaultModelParams,
           int number)
        Creates a new run. This constructor is mainly called from the class BatchRunner.
        Parameters:
        defaultModel - the model to run an experiment with
        defaultExpRunner - the experiment runner used for running the experiment
        defaultExpSettings - the experiment parameter settings
        defaultModelParams - the model parameter settings
        number - internal number of the run (only important if used with batches)

      • Run

        public Run(Model m,
           ExperimentRunner exp)
        Creates a new run without changing model and experiment parameter settings.
        Parameters:
        m - the model to run an experiment with
        exp - the experiment runner used for running the experiment.

      • Run

        public Run()
        Creates a new empty run.

    • Method Detail

      • getModel

        public Model getModel()
        Returns:
        the model an experiment is run with

      • readFromNode

        public void readFromNode(org.w3c.dom.Element e)
        Reads a run from a DOM node representing an XML parameter file.
        Parameters:
        n - the DOM node to read the run from

      • createDefaultExperimentRunner

        protected ExperimentRunner createDefaultExperimentRunner()
        Creates a default desmoj.util.ExperimentRunner. This method might be overridden by subclasses.
        Returns:
        the experiment runner

      • getExperimentRunner

        public ExperimentRunner getExperimentRunner()
        Returns:
        the experiment runner used to run this experiment

      • readParamList

        public static void readParamList(org.w3c.dom.Node src,
                                 java.util.Map dst)
        Reads a parameter list from a DOM node to a java.util.Map. In the map each setting is stored as a key (name of the parameter) and value pair.
        Parameters:
        src - a DOM node containing XML based parameter settings
        dst - a java.uztil.Map to copy the parameter settings to.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
